metadata.synopsis: Two very tired parents are trying to push their child to walk the last few meters separating them from the refugee camp. The kid doesn't know that this isn't just a week-end trip.This is the mother's one-liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to 3;58;-116- Talk to the mother of the TiredWalkers vignette

0.speaker: Nonah Baragezian
0.text: We told our son that this is a holiday to spare him the truth. We don't have homes to go back to.
